REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f2392 reute r f BC-BELL-ATLANTIC-<BEL>-U 10-19 0098

TEXT.TITLE: BELL ATLANTIC <BEL> UNIT SELLS FIVE-YEAR NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Chesapeake and Potomac Telephone Co of Maryland, a unit of Bell Atlantic Corp, is raising 100 mln dlrs via an offering of notes due 1992 with a 10-1/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead underwriter Morgan Stanley. That is 46 basis points more than the yield of comparable Treasury securities. Non-callable for life, the issue is rated Aa-3 by Moody's Investors Service and AA-minus by Standard and Poor's. Late last week, Moody's and S and P downgraded the telephone company's debt ratings, underwriters noted. Reuter
